convertSurface :: Surface -> PixelFormat -> IO Surface #

Produce a new Surface based on an existing one, but optimized for blitting to the specified PixelFormat. SDL_surface contains collection of pixel used SDL_PixelFormat -- format in which pixel info is stored

loadSurface :: FilePath -> Maybe Color -> IO Surface #
